name: no_20
description: If curriculum is no 20, then fitness will be decreased by 100

name: exceed_time
description: If curriculum is exceed time, then fitness will be decreased by 100

name: ConflictClassroom
description: If curriculum is conflict classroom, then fitness will be decreased by 100

name: ConflictTeacher
description: If curriculum is conflict teacher, then fitness will be decreased by 100

name: ConflictGradeCourse
description: If the same grade has the same course, the fitness will be added by 1000.

name: not_on_02_or_05
description: If curriculum is on 02 or 05, then fitness will be increased by 100

name: on_day
description: If curriculum is on 02 or 05, then fitness will be increased by 100

name: custom_rule
description: If the same grade has the same course, the fitness will be added by 1000.
